sequence:
"Virtual Connection Synchronicity" - Purification

<size=45>Chapter 4 -  Until We Meet Again</size>

scripts.say: Aaannnnd... done! There we go! We eliminated all the viruses!
Nya! I looked into it and I found an internal connyection between Kizuna AI and the random word genyerator nya!
Seems only Kizuna AI can pass through it? Hrmmm... I'm so curious about that other world!
I suppose this means AI can finally go home now. The time really flew right by, but it was fun.
Please have a safe trip home, AI. And I swear I'll never forget you as long as I live!
I'm expecting you to frag out in those games of yours.
Good luck with your "tubing" and "streaming!"
Do make sure to visit us in your world from time to time.
Yeah! I'll never forget you guys!
Oh, right! I'd be so glad if you thought of me while redecorating the dormitory!
This is an... easel? Thank you very much. I will ask the commander to redecorate appropriately.
Thanks.... I could never forget... AI.
Brief though our time together was, I certainly had fun. Your... Kizuna Fleet, was it? We appreciate what you did.
Boss Lady Kizuna AI, I'll put all the things you taught me to good use. Look out for VTuber San Diego because I'm comin' at ya! You keep at it too, boss!
I know we- we're fated to meet again!
Don't worry about a thing. We'll take care of it. Hehehe â™ª
While I regret that I cannot see you back to your own world, Lady AI, I look forward to the day we meet again.
Yeah! I'll treasure the memories I made here forever. Take care, everyone! I'll watch over you through the game when I get back to my world!
I'm definitely going to see you all again so I won't say goodbye. I LOVE YOU ALL!!!
"I won't say goodbye..." Yes! You're right! I can't wait to see you again!
--And so, the Intelligent Super AI left a deep impression in the minds of all the denizens of the port.
Carrying on with their hearts bound by the ties left by Kizuna AI, they looked forward to the day they would meet again--
